title: Robots now on the front lines in battle against COVID-19
description: Robots are taking on tasks in hospitals to reduce exposure risk for frontline health care workers, including operating ventilators, taking inventory and delivering PPE.

author: NBCNews.com
title: Families struggle as grocery prices rise amid pandemic
description: Meat and eggs are seeing the biggest price increases during the coronavirus pandemic after demand from restaurants plummeted, resulting in a costly repackaging process. Many families are now having to visit food banks for the first time.

description: The nation’s third largest school district back tracked on holding some classes in person. Some schools have decided to reopen in person, and have seen coronavirus cases already begin to spread.
